title: black screens
body:
Hey riot i have not brought it up but a huge amount of the time i go into queue after the updates i get black screen, why is this.
So the issue i have is going into queue, then as i accept my champ select it goes black ever since these last 4-5 patches repairing fixes it but not all the time i have to repair it multiple times some times please fix this

replies.body:
Hmmm....this is definitely not something I hear of too terribly often.  Usually this points to some type of connection issue.  When you are in Champion Select, the PvP.net Servers are trying to tell your client what to display.  If you lose this connection, the client no longer knows what to display, and gives a black screen instead.  In order to rule this out as a possible root cause, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has the most common solutions that should get everything to appear as it should.

Let me know if it doesn't work at all!

lol its not my net, i have checked my connection when it has happened before that is the weird part it has happen to some of my friends they would click accept on queue when it pops up and they got there champ select screen black and had to close there game
